definition.text: This is the final step in this tutorial but a first big step for you!

paragraphs.text: Now that you have seen how fast and easy is to deploy simple strategies in SA, I leave you with some hints you can explore.
Maybe you can add a new indicator and use its properties like an additional filter for the Trigger Stage
Or you can modify the SL so to have a trailing one istead of being fixed.
Thank you for your time. You can read a more in depth article here: http://bit.ly/9808usHelloWorld
